parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "fairseq",
  "software": [
    "ibm-wml-ce/1.7.1.a0-0",
    "conda",
    "fairseq_1.7.1",
    "jsrun",
    "fairseq-train"
  ],
  "resources": [
    "LSF (Load Sharing Facility)",
    "GPFS (General Parallel File System)",
    "NVME (Non-Volatile Memory Express)",
    "CUDA (Compute Unified Device Architecture)"
  ],
  "configuration": {
    "nodes": 2,
    "cores_per_node": 42,
    "threads_per_core": 4,
    "total_updates": 500000,
    "warmup_updates": 24000,
    "peak_learning_rate": 0.0007,
    "tokens_per_sample": 1024,
    "max_positions": 1024,
    "max_sentences": 4,
    "update_frequency": 160,
    "save_directory": "$MEMBERWORK/bie108/fairseq-uniparc/$LSB_JOBNAME/",
    "data_directory": "/gpfs/alpine/bie108/proj-shared/split_bin/"
  }
}
```
